author: andschwa
body:
Both .NET Core and .NET CLI support RHEL 7.2 now, but we're blocked on #1344.

Otherwise this will be very similar to the CentOS packages.

comments.author: joeyaiello
comments.body: @andschwa says CentOS should just work, we just need to run a test. He's going to own testing the existing CentOS package on RHEL.

comments.author: andschwa
comments.body: Just tested the CentOS package on RHEL 7, and it worked without problems.

title: Create RHEL 7 packages
